title: How Solar Panels Work
description: An educational explainer about solar panel technology and how it converts sunlight to electricity

style.art_style: modern flat illustration, clean vector graphics, vibrant colors, tech-inspired, professional

characters.name: host
characters.description: friendly tech expert character, short dark hair, glasses, wearing a casual blue polo shirt
characters.style: flat illustration style, clean lines, approachable and professional appearance, consistent facial features

characters.name: solar_mascot
characters.description: cute animated sun character with a friendly face, yellow and orange gradients
characters.style: kawaii style, simple rounded shapes, expressive eyes, playful

scenes.voiceover_text: Ever wondered how sunlight becomes electricity? Let me show you the amazing science behind solar panels.
scenes.visual_prompt: standing confidently, gesturing toward a large solar panel illustration

scenes.voiceover_text: Solar panels are made of photovoltaic cells. When sunlight hits these cells, it knocks electrons loose from their atoms, creating an electrical current.
scenes.visual_prompt: pointing at a diagram showing photons hitting solar cells, electrons flowing

scenes.voiceover_text: This is called the photovoltaic effect. Each cell produces a small amount of electricity, but when you connect many cells together, you get enough power to run your home!
scenes.visual_prompt: showing multiple solar cells connected in a grid formation, electricity flowing through wires

scenes.voiceover_text: The electricity created is direct current, or DC. An inverter converts it to alternating current, or AC, which is what your appliances use.
scenes.visual_prompt: standing next to an inverter box illustration, showing DC to AC conversion

scenes.voiceover_text: Modern solar panels are incredibly efficient and can work even on cloudy days. They're a clean, renewable energy source.
scenes.visual_prompt: gesturing at a house with solar panels on the roof, sun and clouds in background

scenes.voiceover_text: That's how solar panels turn sunlight into electricity! Follow for more science explainers.
scenes.visual_prompt: waving goodbye, solar panel and sun in background
